channel.title: CVE Feed for Zyxel -- USG/ZyWALL series firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zyxel -- USG/ZyWALL series firmware

item.title: CVE-2021-35029|2024-08-04T00:33:49.831Z -- zyxel -- usg%2Fzywall%20series%20firmware
item.description: An authentication bypasss vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Zyxel USG/Zywall series firmware versions 4.35 through 4.64 and USG Flex, ATP, and VPN series firmware versions 4.35 through 5.01, which could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on an affected device.
